title: After the Dissolving

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of fractal library with books containing books, Evan and Architect sitting close but distinct, still trembling from the pool
Close on a shared book between them, pages showing their merged experience becoming separate stories again

transformation_notes: The fractal library provides infinite recursive space for processing their boundary dissolution experience. Books within books mirror selves within relationship.
visual_motifs: recursive reflections showing both unity and separation
shared book with two different readings
